feed.title: My home page
feed.subtitle: You can find what you need to know about me (and perhaps more) on these pages (which are based on a design here: [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio).

entry.title: A new location, a new university, a new course!

link.title: A new location, a new university, a new course!

entry.content:
Left Dartmouth after 16 years and moved to southeastern NH - Beautiful! Close to Boston, Portsmouth, and some of the nicest people weâ€™ve ever met. The dogs are adjusted and the house mods are complete. Now if I can just figure out a way to avoid an allergy incident everytime I mow the 4 acres of grass.

First time teaching at SNHU in Fall 2025! Looking forward to meeting everyone for an exciting Full Stack course!
